job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As Windows System Engineer in Accenture Technology - Cloud First, you will play a pivotal role in driving our customers' cloud initiatives, leveraging Microsoft's Azure platform to design, build, migrate, and optimize scalable cloud solutions. Your expertise will be crucial in advancing our customers' cloud adoption strategies, ensuring security and optimizing their infrastructure through effective use of Azure's toolset and frameworks. Join our team and contribute to shaping the future of our customers' cloud infrastructure, leveraging your expertise in Azure to drive innovation and excellence.
     * People You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, system administrators, and project managers, to ensure seamless integration and operation of cloud services for our customers. Your ability to communicate effectively and mentor junior team members will be essential in fostering a collaborative and efficient working environment.
     * Process You will lead the implementation of the Cloud Adoption Framework for our customers, ensuring their processes align with best practices for cloud governance, security, and compliance. Your role will involve refining and enhancing our customers' DevOps processes, facilitating continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and automating infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Bicep or Terraform.
     * Technology Your in-depth understanding of cloud architecture and Azure's capabilities will be instrumental in designing, building, migrating, and optimizing workloads for robust landing zones and other cloud infrastructure components for our customers. You will utilize Azure DevOps tools and services to streamline project workflows and ensure the reliability and scalability of our customers' cloud environments.
     * Task Starting in a dedicated Windows team. This team supports our customers on a daily basis. However, it doesn't stop at supporting, we are constantly striving to optimize and improve these environments. To make this easier, we like to automate with, for example, ARM templates, Ansible, PowerShell and Bash. In this team, our defining characteristic is the exceptional level of ownership we demonstrate. We work closely with other client teams and with the consulting team to deliver great results. It will be your job to implement and perfect complex IT environments for a long time. After implementation, you will monitor them, keep them running and continuously improve. You always see opportunities to improve it. If this also applies to you and you like to know everything about new technologies and apply this directly to the projects of our customers, read on.

   With all our roles, there is some in-person time for collaboration, learning and building relationships with clients, peers, leaders, and communities. As an employer, we will be as flexible as possible to support your specific work/life needs.
job_details.full_text:
Windows System Engineer

As Windows System Engineer in Accenture Technology - Cloud First, you will play a pivotal role in driving our customers' cloud initiatives, leveraging Microsoft's Azure platform to design, build, migrate, and optimize scalable cloud solutions. Your expertise will be crucial in advancing our customers' cloud adoption strategies, ensuring security and optimizing their infrastructure through effective use of Azure's toolset and frameworks. Join our team and contribute to shaping the future of our customers' cloud infrastructure, leveraging your expertise in Azure to drive innovation and excellence.
     * People You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, system administrators, and project managers, to ensure seamless integration and operation of cloud services for our customers. Your ability to communicate effectively and mentor junior team members will be essential in fostering a collaborative and efficient working environment.
     * Process You will lead the implementation of the Cloud Adoption Framework for our customers, ensuring their processes align with best practices for cloud governance, security, and compliance. Your role will involve refining and enhancing our customers' DevOps processes, facilitating continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and automating infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Bicep or Terraform.
     * Technology Your in-depth understanding of cloud architecture and Azure's capabilities will be instrumental in designing, building, migrating, and optimizing workloads for robust landing zones and other cloud infrastructure components for our customers. You will utilize Azure DevOps tools and services to streamline project workflows and ensure the reliability and scalability of our customers' cloud environments.
     * Task Starting in a dedicated Windows team. This team supports our customers on a daily basis. However, it doesn't stop at supporting, we are constantly striving to optimize and improve these environments. To make this easier, we like to automate with, for example, ARM templates, Ansible, PowerShell and Bash. In this team, our defining characteristic is the exceptional level of ownership we demonstrate. We work closely with other client teams and with the consulting team to deliver great results. It will be your job to implement and perfect complex IT environments for a long time. After implementation, you will monitor them, keep them running and continuously improve. You always see opportunities to improve it. If this also applies to you and you like to know everything about new technologies and apply this directly to the projects of our customers, read on.

   With all our roles, there is some in-person time for collaboration, learning and building relationships with clients, peers, leaders, and communities. As an employer, we will be as flexible as possible to support your specific work/life needs.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional Windows system engineering and cloud infrastructure management using Azure, with no mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models. The tasks described are primarily related to infrastructure, automation, and cloud services, not AI development or deployment.

phrases.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the customer's strategic goals related to cloud adoption.

phrases.phrase: advancing our customers' cloud adoption strategies
phrases.justification: This highlights the need to align technical work with business objectives for cloud migration.

phrases.phrase: ensure seamless integration and operation of cloud services for our customers
phrases.justification: This implies understanding how technical solutions support business operations and customer needs.

phrases.phrase: ensure their processes align with best practices for cloud governance, security, and compliance
phrases.justification: This shows a need to understand business requirements related to governance and compliance in a cloud context.
This is a general business objective that the role contributes to.

phrases.phrase: design, build, migrate, and optimize scalable cloud solutions
phrases.justification: While focused on infrastructure, the design and build aspects involve creating and configuring systems, akin to software development in an infrastructure context.

phrases.phrase: designing, building, migrating, and optimizing workloads for robust landing zones and other cloud infrastructure components
phrases.justification: This involves the creation and configuration of cloud infrastructure, which has elements of software development for infrastructure.

phrases.phrase: implement and perfect complex IT environments
phrases.justification: This involves the creation and configuration of IT systems, which is a form of development.

phrases.phrase: optimizing their infrastructure through effective use of Azure's toolset and frameworks
phrases.justification: This involves maintaining and improving existing infrastructure, a core operations task.

phrases.phrase: refining and enhancing our customers' DevOps processes
phrases.justification: Directly mentions DevOps processes, which are foundational to MLOps.

phrases.phrase: facilitating continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines
phrases.justification: CI/CD is a key component of MLOps and general DevOps.

phrases.phrase: automating infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools
phrases.justification: IaC is a critical practice in modern operations and MLOps.

phrases.phrase: utilize Azure DevOps tools and services to streamline project workflows
phrases.justification: Azure DevOps is a platform for managing development and operations lifecycles, including CI/CD and infrastructure management.

phrases.phrase: monitor them, keep them running and continuously improve
phrases.justification: These are core responsibilities of operations and system maintenance.

technologies: continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines
